name: Frisco Ghost Town
description_short: One of Utah's best-preserved ghost towns.
description_long: Explore remnants of a 19th-century mining town with eerie structures and sweeping Basin-and-Range vistas.

name: Ogden's Halloween Alley
description_short: Spooky storefronts and festive lights in Historic 25th Street.
description_long: A walkable, family-safe Halloween scene with costumes, treats, and local storefront displays.
